description:
This is an interim update, the main update for the week will be posted tomorrow.

This is Erica’s first time with the machines. Peter takes her down to the dungeon and turns the Monster, both the Intruders, and the Hatchett loose on her. She finishes with a ride on the Rocker with the TitSuckers on. She’s a very nice, genuine, low-key girl. It’s especially funny and cute when she has an orgasm: She usually laughs, squirms, and tries to run away! :)
Also, for you anal lovers, she takes the Intruder in the ass on the bondage horse.
title: Erica Sommers
